Container.Name: TubeSync
Container.TagDescription: Automated builds from the main branch
Container.Overview: Syncs YouTube channels and playlists to a locally hosted media server
Container.DonateText: If you are gracious enough to sponsor me your contributions will go towards allowing me to spend time on maintaining the existing open source projects on my profile as well as polishing other projects into a state suitable to be made open source.
Container.Description: TubeSync is a PVR (personal video recorder) for YouTube. Or, like Sonarr but for YouTube (with a built-in download client). It is designed to synchronize channels and playlists from YouTube to local directories and update your media server once media is downloaded.

Config.Name: Database URL
Config.Description: Optional external database connection details. Ex: mysql://user:pass@host:port/database. Default is none.

Config.Name: WebUI Username
Config.Description: Sets the username for HTTP basic authentication. Default is none.

Config.Name: WebUI Password
Config.Description: Sets the password for HTTP basic authentication. Default is none.

Config.Name: Allowed Hosts
Config.Description: Django's ALLOWED_HOSTS; valid values for the 'Host' HTTP request header. Ex: tubesync.example.com,192.168.0.100. Default is '*'.

Config.Name: Debugging
Config.Description: Must be True to enable debugging. Default is False.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: UID for permissions. Do not change, unless you know what you are doing.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: GID for permissions. Do not change, unless you know what you are doing.
